definitions.text: English navigator who claimed the east coast of Australia for Britain and discovered several Pacific islands (1728-1779)
prepare for eating by applying heat
examples: can you make me an omelette?
fix breakfast for the guests, please

definitions.text: transform and make suitable for consumption by heating
examples: These potatoes have to cook for 20 minutes

definitions.text: tamper, with the purpose of deception

examples: The apothecary cooked the medicinal mixture in a big iron kettle
